meanings.definition: In a way that cannot be expressed in words.
meanings.sent1: She looked unutterably sad after hearing the news.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the sunset left me unutterably amazed.
meanings.sent3: His unutterably serious face made me burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room was unutterably loud.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the cake was unutterably delicious.

meanings.sent1: The storm unutterably frightened the children.
meanings.sent2: She unutterably loves her job as a teacher.
meanings.sent3: His unutterably fast running made everyone cheer.
meanings.sent4: The news was unutterably shocking to the whole town.
meanings.sent5: The mountain was unutterably tall against the sky.
